Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the UserName. For example: mystack-myuser-1CCXAFG2H2U4D.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: Returns the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the specified AWS::IAM::User  resource. For example: arn:aws:iam::123456789012:user/mystack-myuser-1CCXAFG2H2U4D.
